resources.string: To continue playing, you need to share your current location with us. \nPlease allow the Location Permission all the time & turn on Precise Location for our application from the Settings.
To continue playing, you need to share your current location with us. \nPlease allow the Location Permission all the time for our application from the Settings.
To continue playing, you need to share your current location with us. \nPlease allow the Location Permission for our application from the Settings.
- Tap Permissions\n- Then switch Location on

- Tap Permissions
- Then tap Location
- Choose Allow all the time
- Turn on Precise Location
- Tap Permissions\n- Then tap Location\n- Choose Allow all the time
